text: The innocent worm lizard (Amphisbaena innocens) is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is endemic to Hispaniola. ==References== Category:Amphisbaena (lizard) Category:Reptiles described in 1862 Category:Taxa named by David Friedrich Weinland Category:Endemic fauna of Hispaniola Category:Reptiles of the Dominican Republic Category:Reptiles of Haiti
title: Innocent worm lizard
